org.oddjob.sql

Class SQLClock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.oddjob.sql.SQLClock

  • public class SQLClock
extends Object

    Description

    Runs a SQL query. If the SQL provides results then they are available as nested properties of rows, and possibly row, properties of this job.
